title: How to Delete Archived Messages on Facebook Messenger

steps.title: Open Messenger.
steps.content: Open Messenger. Facebook Messenger has an icon with an image that resembles a blue and purple speech bubble with a lightning bolt in the middle. Tap the Facebook Messenger icon to open Messenger on your mobile phone. Alternatively, you can open Facebook and tap the icon that resembles a speech bubble with a lightning bolt in the middle. It's in the upper-right corner. Make sure you updated Messenger to the latest version. If you do not have Facebook Messenger installed on your mobile phone , you can download and install Messenger for free from the App Store on iPhone and iPad, or from the Google Play Store on Android devices.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's the button with three horizontal lines in the upper-left corner. This displays the menu.

steps.title: Tap Archive.
steps.content: Tap Archive . It's in the menu that displays when you tap the menu button. This displays all your archived chats .

steps.title: Tap and hold the chat you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap and hold the chat you want to delete. This displays a menu at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . It's next to an icon that resembles a trashcan. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This deletes the chat. Once a chat is deleted, it cannot be recovered. Don't delete a chat unless you are sure you want to remove it.

steps.title: Navigate to https://www.facebook.com.
steps.content: Navigate to https://www.facebook.com . You can access Messenger through Facebook on a desktop computer. If you aren't already logged into Facebook, enter your Facebook email and password, then click "Log In".

steps.title: Click the "Messages" button.
steps.content: Click the "Messages" button. It's in the upper-right corner next to your profile picture. It has an icon that resembles a speech bubble with a lightning bolt in the middle. This displays Messenger in a window in the lower-right corner.

steps.title: Click See all in Messenger.
steps.content: Click See all in Messenger . It's at the bottom of your list of chats in the Messenger window. This displays Facebook Messenger as a full web page.

steps.title: Click ⋯.
steps.content: Click ⋯ . It's the button with three dots at the top of your list of chats on the left-hand side. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Archived Chats.
steps.content: Click Archived Chats . It's in the drop-down menu that displays when you click the icon with three dots. This displays all your archived chats . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click ⋯ next to the chat you want to delete.
steps.content: Click ⋯ next to the chat you want to delete. When you hover your mouse cursor over a chat, a button with three dots will appear to the right of the chat name. Click this button. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Delete Chat.
steps.content: Click Delete Chat . It's in the menu that appears when you click the button with three dots. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Click Delete Chat.
steps.content: Click Delete Chat . This deletes the chat. Once a chat is deleted, it cannot be recovered. Don't delete a chat unless you are sure you want to remove it.
